title: Manage Trading Position Limits
description: A risk controller checks a trader's proposed trade to ensure it will not cause them to exceed their authorized risk limits.

tasks.description: Receive a pre-trade check request for a new crude oil futures purchase.
tasks.expected_outcome: The details of the proposed trade are logged for checking.

tasks.description: Retrieve the trader's current open positions and their established risk limits (e.g., volumetric limit, VaR limit).
tasks.expected_outcome: The trader's current risk profile and limits are retrieved.

tasks.description: Simulate the impact of the new trade on the trader's positions and check if any limits would be breached.
tasks.expected_outcome: The simulation shows the new trade would not breach any limits. The trade is approved.
